languages.text: {n}Магос внимательно изучает вид-скрин.{/n} "Оболочка создана на неизвестном мне мире-кузне. Начинаю стандартную литургию воззвания к машинному духу". {n}Паскаль склоняется над соседней приборной панелью и кладет руки на элементы управления. В то же мгновение из его вокса начинает тихо литься вязь машинного кода.{/n}

{n}The Magos intently studies the vid-screen.{/n} "The shell was created on a forge world unknown to me. Initiating standard invocation of the machine spirit." {n}Pasqal leans over the adjacent instrument panel and sets his hands on the controls. At the same time, a quiet stream of machine code begins pouring forth from his vox.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Магос внимательно изучает вид-скрин.{/n} "Оболочка создана на неизвестном мне мире-кузне. В то же мгновение из его вокса начинает тихо литься вязь машинного кода.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位贤者专注地研究着视讯屏幕。{/n}“这个框架是在某个我并不了解的铸造世界中制造出来的。准备启动机魂的标准调用程序。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身，检查着旁边的仪表板，将双手放在了控制台上。与此同时，他的音阵系统传来了一段安静的机器代码。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Magos intently studies the vid-screen.{/n} "The shell was created on a forge world unknown to me. Initiating standard invocation of the machine spirit." {n}Pasqal leans over the adjacent instrument panel and sets his hands on the controls. At the same time, a quiet stream of machine code begins pouring forth from his vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位贤者专注地研究着视讯屏幕。{/n}“这个框架是在某个我并不了解的铸造世界中制造出来的。准备启动机魂的标准调用程序。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身，检查着旁边的仪表板，将双手放在了控制台上。与此同时，他的音阵系统传来了一段安静的机器代码。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マゴスはスクリーンを熱心に眺めている。{/n}「このシェルは、自分の知らない工業惑星で作られたものです。機械精霊の標準的な呼び出しを開始します」{n}パスカルは隣の操作パネルに身を乗り出し、制御盤に手をかける。同時に、彼のヴォクスから静かなマシンコードの旋律が流れ出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Magos intently studies the vid-screen.{/n} "The shell was created on a forge world unknown to me. Initiating standard invocation of the machine spirit." {n}Pasqal leans over the adjacent instrument panel and sets his hands on the controls. At the same time, a quiet stream of machine code begins pouring forth from his vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マゴスはスクリーンを熱心に眺めている。{/n}「このシェルは、私の知らない工業惑星で作られたものです。機械精霊の標準的な呼び出しを開始します」{n}パスカルは隣の操作パネルに身を乗り出し、制御盤に手をかける。同時に、彼のヴォクすから静かなマシンコードの旋律が流れ出す。{/n}
{n}マゴスはスクリーンを熱心に眺めている。{/n}「このシェルは、自分の知らない工業惑星で作られたものです。機械精霊の標準的な呼び出しを開始します」{n}パスカルは隣の操作パネルに身を乗り出し、制御盤に手をかける。同時に、彼のヴォクスから静かなマシンコードの旋律が流れ出す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Magos studiert konzentriert den Vid-Bildschirm.{/n} "Die Hülle wurde auf einer mir unbekannten Fabrikwelt gebaut. Initialisiere Standardanrufung des Maschinengeists." {n}Pasqal lehnt sich über das angrenzende Instrumentenfeld und legt seine Hände an die Steuerung. Gleichzeitig strömt leise eine Abfolge von Maschinencode aus seinem Vox.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Magos intently studies the vid-screen.{/n} "The shell was created on a forge world unknown to me. Initiating standard invocation of the machine spirit." {n}Pasqal leans over the adjacent instrument panel and sets his hands on the controls. At the same time, a quiet stream of machine code begins pouring forth from his vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Magos studiert konzentriert den Vid-Bildschirm.{/n} "Die Hülle wurde auf einer mir unbekannten Fabrikwelt gebaut. Initialisiere Standardanrufung des Maschinengeists." {n}Pasqal lehnt sich über das angrenzende Instrumentenfeld und legt seine Hände an die Steuerung. Gleichzeitig strömt leise eine Abfolge von Maschinencode aus seinem Vox.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le magos observe attentivement l'écran.{/n} « L'architecture a été créée sur un monde forge qui m'est inconnu. Initiation de l'invocation standard de l'esprit de la machine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur le tableau de bord adjacent et pose les mains sur les commandes. Au même moment, un flot continu de code machine jaillit de son vox.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Magos intently studies the vid-screen.{/n} "The shell was created on a forge world unknown to me. Initiating standard invocation of the machine spirit." {n}Pasqal leans over the adjacent instrument panel and sets his hands on the controls. At the same time, a quiet stream of machine code begins pouring forth from his vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le magos observe attentivement l'écran.{/n} « L'architecture a été créée sur un monde forge qui m'est inconnu. Initiation de l'invocation standard de l'esprit de la machine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur le tableau de bord adjacent et pose les mains sur les commandes. Au même moment, un flot continu de code machine jaillit de son vox.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El magos examina atentamente la videopantalla.{/n} «El armazón fue creado en un mundo forja que no conozco. Iniciando invocación estándar del espíritu máquina». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el panel instrumental adyacente y coloca sus manos sobre los controles. Al mismo tiempo, una casi silenciosa retahíla de código máquina surge de su voco.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Magos intently studies the vid-screen.{/n} "The shell was created on a forge world unknown to me. Initiating standard invocation of the machine spirit." {n}Pasqal leans over the adjacent instrument panel and sets his hands on the controls. At the same time, a quiet stream of machine code begins pouring forth from his vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El magos examina atentamente la videopantalla.{/n} «El armazón fue creado en un mundo forja que no conozco. Iniciando invocación estándar del espíritu máquina». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el panel instrumental adyacente y coloca sus manos sobre los controles. Al mismo tiempo, una casi silenciosa retahíla de código máquina surge de su voco.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Magos video ekranını dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "Kabuk, aşina olmadığım bir döküm dünyasında yaratılmış. Makine ruhuna standart yakarış başlatılıyor." {n}Pasqal, yakınındaki aygıt panelinin üzerine eğilip ellerini kontrollere yerleştiriyor. Bu esnada da voksundan kısık sesli bir makine kodu akışı dökülmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Magos intently studies the vid-screen.{/n} "The shell was created on a forge world unknown to me. Initiating standard invocation of the machine spirit." {n}Pasqal leans over the adjacent instrument panel and sets his hands on the controls. At the same time, a quiet stream of machine code begins pouring forth from his vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"Magos video ekranını dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "Kabuk benim aşina olmadığım bir döküm dünyasında yaratılmış. Makine ruhuna standart yakarış başlatılıyor." {n}Pasqal yakınındaki aygıt paneline uzanıyor ve ellerini kontrollerin üzerine yerleştiriyor. Aynı anda voksundan sessiz bir makine kodu akışı başlıyor.{/n}
